ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] More women playing EQ lately?
ygData.msgSnippet: You have to admit, male gnomes are really funny looking.... ... From: Dawn To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com Sent: Thursday, May 02, 2002 6:40 PM Subject: Re:
ygData.messageBody:
You have to admit, male gnomes are really funny looking....
----- Original Message -----
From: Dawn
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, May 02, 2002 6:40 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] More women playing EQ lately?

Hi,

ROFLOL at Rob.  Yeah EC definitely!!!!

I'm female and I play female characters.  The only way I'd consider playing
a male character is if their stats were better.  But, since EQ is an equal
opportunity creator, meaning men and women share the same stats, it's not an
issue.

Now, I do notice that when I'm playing with my 22 year old son and his male
character I get a few more buffs than him but not often.

Maybe men play female characters because they think it will help them
understand women better.  LOL  just joking!

Anyway, I love the game and I don't care whether your male or female just as
long as you enjoy the game!

Kanalyn 17 Druid
Analyn 9 Beastlord
Allilee 9 Ranger
Maralexis 9 Wizard
Tarew Marr

Anelalyn 7 Cleric
Karana
